Question.Subject: Another website like ebay.?
Question.Content: It is where an item starts at 0$ and each time goes up by 1 cent each time. I can't remember but I saw a commercial the other day. Please help! thanks :)
Question.ChosenAnswer:
1. Niche auction sites WineBid http://www.winebid Penbid.com http://www.penbid.com LabX http://www.labx.com Just Beads! http://www.justbeads.com Pottery Auction http://www.potteryauction.com Bid4Assets http://www.bid4assets.com
2. Yahoo! Auctions http://auctions.yahoo.com/
3. Overstock http://www.overstock.com
4. Amazon.com http://www.amazon.com
5. Live Auction sites such as Bidz.com http://www.bidz.com
6. http://buyonit.com
